panels.description: Click a data point to view location details. Location information is only available when the vehicleâ€™s engine is off. If the vehicle is moving, the panel shows the last location before moving.

options.content: To see most recent location, click on [Reset Timestamp]( /d/${__dashboard.uid}/?var-click_ts=${__to:date:seconds} )
